name: PROCASTINASHIPDESKTOP
description:
3 minutes shooter made in 1 week

PLEASE COMMENT, RATE, and SHARE PLEASE =)

1 2 3 4 to scale the game view

USE Arrow to move

"Space bar" to shoot

"Q" to upgrade Engines - 10 score

"W" to upgrade Weapons - 10 score

"E" to upgrade Shields - 10 score

"R" to extra support ship - 10 score

-Game design

jameschappfillmore.itch

-Code

jameschappfillmore.itch

-3D to 2D graphic convertion 

jameschappfillmore.itch

-Space ship assets  by niko-3d-models

https://niko-3d-models.itch.io/free-sc-fi-spaceships-pack

-Asteroids by jfaexe https://jfaexe.itch.io/simple-pixel-spaceships

-Planets By wisedawn https://wisedawn.itch.io/20-cc0-planets

-Galaxies and some ships by zintoki

https://zintoki.itch.io/space-breaker

-Space Backgrounds vectorpixelstar https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/space

Nebula Sprites by v-ktor

https://v-ktor.itch.io/nebula-background-images

Music by Patrick Patrikios  Track :Forget Me Not
